languages.text: "Я обращался и получил отказ. Как он справедливо отметил, с момента сбора десятины ответственность за нее ложится на Адептус Арбитес. Также Вольный Торговец Винтерскейл отметил, что потеря мира — уже достаточный ущерб протекторату, и он не намерен тратить ресурсы на возвращение того, что ему больше не принадлежит".

"I did and I was rebuffed. As Rogue Trader Winterscale rightly pointed out, from the moment of the tithe's collection, responsibility for it transfers to the Adeptus Arbites. He also noted that the loss of a world is not an inconsiderable detriment to his protectorate, and he has no intention of expending resources to recover something that no longer belongs to him."
languages.original_text: "Я обращался и получил отказ. Как он справедливо отметил, с момента сбора десятины ответственность за нее ложится на Адептус Арбитес. Также Вольный Торговец Винтерскейл отметил, что потеря мира — уже достаточный ущерб протекторату, и он не намерен тратить ресурсы на возвращение того, что ему больше не принадлежит".

He also noted that the loss of a world is a not inconsiderate detriment to his protectorate, and he has no intention of expending resources to recover something that no longer belongs to him."

He also noted that the loss of a world is a not inconsiderate detriment to his protectorate, and he has no intention of expending resources to recover something that no longer belongs to him."

He also noted that the loss of a world is not an inconsiderable detriment to his protectorate, and he has no intention of expending resources to recover something that no longer belongs to him."

"I did and I was rebuffed. As Rogue Trader Winterscale rightly pointed out, from the moment of the tithe's collection, responsibility for it transfers to the Adeptus Arbites. He also noted that the loss of a world is not an inconsiderable detriment to his protectorate, and he has no intention of expending resources to recover something that no longer belongs to him."

languages.text: «Lo hice y me rechazó. Como el Comerciante Independiente Winterscale señaló, desde el momento en que se recolecta el diezmo, su responsabilidad se transfiere al Adeptus Arbites. También comentó que la pérdida de un mundo es un detrimento considerable para su protectorado, y no tiene intención de dedicar recursos a recuperar algo que no le pertenece».
languages.original_text: "I did and I was rebuffed. As Rogue Trader Winterscale rightly pointed out, from the moment of the tithe's collection, responsibility for it transfers to the Adeptus Arbites. He also noted that the loss of a world is not an inconsiderable detriment to his protectorate, and he has no intention of expending resources to recover something that no longer belongs to him."

traits.locale_text: «Lo hice y me rechazó. Como el Comerciante Independiente Winterscale señaló, desde el momento en que se recolecta el diezmo, su responsabilidad se transfiere al Adeptus Arbites. También comentó que la pérdida de un mundo es un detrimento considerable para su protectorado, y no tiene intención de dedicar recursos a recuperar algo que no le pertenece».

languages.text: “我找过他，但他拒绝了我的请求。行商浪人温特斯凯尔说得没错，从什一税被征收的那一刻起，它的责任就从行商浪人的手中转移到了帝国法务部肩上。他还指出，他的王朝失去了小莱卡德这个世界，这是不可忽视的重大损失。他无意继续耗费资源，寻回早已不再属于他的财产。”
languages.original_text: "I did and I was rebuffed. As Rogue Trader Winterscale rightly pointed out, from the moment of the tithe's collection, responsibility for it transfers to the Adeptus Arbites. He also noted that the loss of a world is not an inconsiderable detriment to his protectorate, and he has no intention of expending resources to recover something that no longer belongs to him."

traits.locale_text: “我找过他，但他拒绝了我的请求。行商浪人温特斯凯尔说得没错，从什一税被征收的那一刻起，它的责任就从行商浪人的手中转移到了帝国法务部肩上。他还指出，他的王朝失去了小莱卡德这个世界，这是不可忽视的重大损失。他无意继续耗费资源，寻回早已不再属于他的财产。”

languages.text: « Je l'ai fait, et j'ai essuyé un refus. Comme l'a fort justement souligné le libre-marchand Winterscale, sitôt collectée, la dîme devient la responsabilité de l'Adeptus Arbites. Il m'a également fait remarquer que son protectorat a beaucoup souffert de la perte de ce monde, et qu'il n'a aucune intention de gaspiller ses ressources pour récupérer quelque chose qui ne lui appartient plus. »
languages.original_text: "I did and I was rebuffed. As Rogue Trader Winterscale rightly pointed out, from the moment of the tithe's collection, responsibility for it transfers to the Adeptus Arbites. He also noted that the loss of a world is not an inconsiderable detriment to his protectorate, and he has no intention of expending resources to recover something that no longer belongs to him."

Il m'a également fait remarquer que son protectorat a beaucoup souffert de la perte de ce monde, et qu'il n'a aucune intention de gaspiller ses ressources pour récupérer quelque chose qui ne lui appartient plus. »

« Je l'ai fait, et j'ai essuyé un refus. Comme l'a fort justement souligné le libre-marchand Winterscale, sitôt collectée, la dîme devient la responsabilité de l'Adeptus Arbites. Il m'a également fait remarquer que son protectorat a beaucoup souffert de la perte de ce monde, et qu'il n'a aucune intention de gaspiller ses ressources pour récupérer quelque chose qui ne lui appartient plus. »

languages.text: 「私はやったし、拒絶されました。ローグトレーダーのウインタースケールがちょうど指摘したように、租税の徴収の瞬間から、その責任はアデプトゥス・アルビテスに移されます。彼も惑星の喪失は彼の保護領への向こう見ずな損失であり、もはや彼に属さないものを取り戻すためにリソースを使うつもりはないとも述べました」
languages.original_text: "I did and I was rebuffed. As Rogue Trader Winterscale rightly pointed out, from the moment of the tithe's collection, responsibility for it transfers to the Adeptus Arbites. He also noted that the loss of a world is not an inconsiderable detriment to his protectorate, and he has no intention of expending resources to recover something that no longer belongs to him."

traits.locale_text: 「私はやったし、拒絶されました。ローグトレーダーのウインタースケールがちょうど指摘したように、租税の徴収の瞬間から、その責任はアデプトゥス・アルビテスに移されます。彼も惑星の喪失は彼の保護領への向こう見ずな損失であり、もはや彼に属さないものを取り戻すためにリソースを使うつもりはないとも述べました」
「私はやったし、拒絶されました。ローグトレーダーのウインタースケールがちょうど指摘したように、租税の徴収の瞬間から、その責任はアデプトゥス・アルビテスに移されます。彼も惑星の喪失は彼の保護領への向こう見ずな損失であり、もはや彼に属さないものを取り戻すためにリソースを使うつもりはないとも述べました」

languages.text: "Bu dediğinizi yaptım. Reddedildim. Görüşmemiz sırasında Hür Tacir Winterscale'in de belirttiği üzere aşarın sorumluluğu, toplandığı an itibarıyla Adeptus Arbites'e geçmişti. Ayrıca kendisi, bir dünyasının yitişinin protektorası için hiç de azımsanamayacak bir kayıp olduğunu ve artık kendisine ait olmayan bir şeyi geri almak için kaynak harcamaya niyetli olmadığını ifade etti."
languages.original_text: "I did and I was rebuffed. As Rogue Trader Winterscale rightly pointed out, from the moment of the tithe's collection, responsibility for it transfers to the Adeptus Arbites. He also noted that the loss of a world is not an inconsiderable detriment to his protectorate, and he has no intention of expending resources to recover something that no longer belongs to him."

"Bu dediğinizi yaptım. Reddedildim. Görüşmemiz sırasında Hür Tacir Winterscale'in de belirttiği üzere aşarın sorumluluğu, toplandığı an itibarıyla Adeptus Arbites'e geçmişti. Ayrıca kendisi, bir dünyasının yitişinin protektorası için hiç de azımsanamayacak bir kayıp olduğunu ve artık kendisine ait olmayan bir şeyi geri almak için kaynak harcamaya niyetli olmadığını ifade etti."

languages.text: "Weil ich dort abgewiesen wurde. Wie Freihändler Winterzunder richtig angemerkt hat, war zum Zeitpunkt der Erhebung des Zehnts das Adeptus Arbites für dessen Transfer verantwortlich. Er hat ferner angemerkt, dass der Verlust einer Welt für sein Protektorat ein erheblicher Schaden ist und er nicht gedenkt, Ressourcen in die Bergung von etwas zu investieren, das ihm nicht mehr gehört."
languages.original_text: "I did and I was rebuffed. As Rogue Trader Winterscale rightly pointed out, from the moment of the tithe's collection, responsibility for it transfers to the Adeptus Arbites. He also noted that the loss of a world is not an inconsiderable detriment to his protectorate, and he has no intention of expending resources to recover something that no longer belongs to him."
